Wishlist

This is a general shopping list and wish list of things that anyone could help out with. The most important item is a larger space to set up and work in. The others are things we could buy new or second hand or build in some cases.

If you can help with any of this, please get in touch

Item Notes
A Larger Makerspace Our most important need is for a large, low-cost or free warehouse or building suitable to use as a makerspace. If you are able to help in some way, please contact us!
Digital Oscilloscope We have just received a 40MHz Cathode Ray Oscilloscope (and other great instruments) from the lovely folks at Battery Shed/Innovation Circle. But a digital one would be nice too.
Rack-style powerboard
Powerboards with switches
Wastepaper baskets
Stanley knife
Scraper plus blades
Wide but shallow shelving for electronics desk
Pliers e.g. Side cutters, combination pliers, long nose pliers, round nose pliers
Saw Electric jigsaw with wood cutting blades
Marking square
Drill bit set
Cordless drill
File(s) flat and round, coarse and smooth
Hacksaw (and blades)
Workbench Needs to be very sturdy
Vise Large, bolt-on type
Nicer digital multimeter
Wire strippers
Cups for kitchen
Racks for allen keys, screwdrivers, etc.
